      • setStatusMessage

        KsqlTerminal.StatusClosable setStatusMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Set a status message in the terminal.

        The message is removed once the returned KsqlTerminal.StatusClosable is closed.

        Parameters:
        message - the message to display
        Returns:
        the closable that will remove the status message.
